Reason: The configuration option OPTIMIZE_OR in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When set to true, the system may prioritize optimizing OR operations, which can lead to increased execution time and memory consumption. On the other hand, setting it to false may result in faster execution but potentially higher memory usage. Therefore, the value of OPTIMIZE_OR directly affects system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration.
